page_content:
MDF
Methanol is used to 
make plywood and 
medium-density 
fibreboard (MDF) used 
in home construction.
TEXTILES
Methanol is used 
in applications that 
help make upholstery 
textiles stain resistant.PLASTIC 
APPLICATIONS
Methanol is a key 
component in olefins 
used for various 
plastics applications. SEALANTS AND 
PAINT
Methanol is an 
essential ingredient in 
sealants and paints.
Methanol is a highly versatile chemical 
building block used to make thousands  
of everyday products. 
Methanol is Essential 
for Everyday Life
>50%
Over half of the world’ s 
methanol is used in various 
chemical applications, often to 
produce derivatives that are key 
ingredients in everyday products.
